name: Baker Hughes Company
description: Baker Hughes Company is a leading energy technology company that provides a wide range of solutions to the oil and gas industry. Founded in 1907, Baker Hughes operates in more than 120 countries, delivering innovative systems and services that improve efficiency and sustainability in energy production. The company specializes in various segments, including oilfield services, digital solutions, and turbine technology, catering to both conventional and renewable energy sectors. Baker Hughes is committed to advancing the energy transition by integrating digital technologies and sustainable practices into their operations, helping customers reduce emissions and improve productivity. With a strong focus on research and development, the company continues to innovate, developing advanced technologies such as the Digital Twin and AI-driven analytics that optimize the performance of energy assets. Baker Hughes also emphasizes collaboration with partners to enhance energy efficiency and reduce environmental impact, making strides towards a more sustainable energy future.
